mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.OCCRRNC_DE, '%Y%m%d' ) , b.HOSTNAME , b.SVC_NM , b.METHOD_NM , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CREAT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'U' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UPDT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'R' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RDCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'D' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DELETE_CO , 0 AS ERROR_CO FROM COMTNSYSLOG b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(c.OCCRRNC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d' ) FROM COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY c WHERE DATE_FORMAT(c.OCCRRNC_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') ) AND DATE_FORMAT(b.OCCRRNC_DE, '%Y%m%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(b.OCCRRNC_DE, '%Y%m%d' ) , b.HOSTNAME , b.SVC_NM , b.METHOD_NM

INSERT INTO COMTSWEBLOGSUMMARY SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.OCCRRNC_DE, '%Y%m%d' ) , b.HOSTNAME , b.URL , COUNT(DATE_FORMAT(b.OCCRRNC_DE, '%Y-%m-%d' )) AS RDCNT FROM COMTNWEBLOG b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(c.OCCRRNC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d' ) FROM COMTSWEBLOGSUMMARY c WHERE DATE_FORMAT(c.OCCRRNC_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') ) AND DATE_FORMAT(b.OCCRRNC_DE, '%Y%m%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(b.OCCRRNC_DE, '%Y%m%d' ) , b.HOSTNAME , b.URL
